channel.title: Torcher- Flamethrower Game
channel.description:
[U]Intorduction[/U] You are the last lone Flamethrower. Defend yourself from the Hoards of Zombies out to get you.
In the middle of a wasteland, you must burn all to save yourself. You can also call an airstrike to drop bombs.
Killing Zombies increases your Kills. Getting your kills to 50 increases your level. Increasing you level makes the zombies move faster and your flame and explosion move slower.
[U]Controls[/U] Click somewhere to Shoot Flames. Press P to Pause. Hold Ctrl and Click to Drop a bomb.
[U]Screenshots[/U] This Game saves a screenshot of itself when you die. Its saved in the SCAR root folder, normally called SCAR 2.03\
[IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/622/screenshotuk1.png[/img]
This script uses [b]No Pre-Draw Bitmaps[/b], everything is drawn in the script with the delphi TCanvas class

item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i am lolscape:

Line 354: [Error] (354:15): Unknown identifier ‘GetApplication’ in script C:\DOCUME~1\David\LOCALS~1\Temp\Torcher.scar

this script was made with SCAR 2.03, you appear to be running it with SCAR Divi, you have to use 2.03 to run it, but I think ill make a Divi version soon…

Rune Hacker, how about some screenshots of green flames? :rolleyes:

You can get better SCAR performance by setting it’s process priority to highest. (or realtime, if you like extremes )

Read full topic

item.title: Torcher- Flamethrower Game
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:10, topic:72174”]bitmaps would make it slower, when i was first making it, everything was a bitmap, the plane, the monsters, the flames, and it went a lot slower,
im a bit annoyed that you’re all blaming me for Scar’s performance, if i could use threads, or if this was written in delphi, it would go much better,

so short of becoming like impsoft, im going to offer you all Free Beer to produce more enthusiasm[/quote]
I don’t blame you, i know exactly what you mean. Scar lacks in performance badly.

Good job.

Read full topic

item.title: Torcher- Flamethrower Game
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i cant put any waits because it uses TTimers, they wait a while then fire their event
and i cant put transparency because this isnt fast drawing, i just using the delphi TCanvas class,

heres an example, the procedure which draws a monster

procedure DrawMonster(x,y:integer);
begin
Canvas.Pen.Width:=1;
Canvas.Brush.Style:= bsSolid;
Canvas.Brush.Color:=0;
Canvas.Pen.Color:=0;
Canvas.Rectangle(x,y-2,x+60,y+60); //clears area
Canvas.Brush.Color:=16512;
Canvas.Pen.Color:=16512;
Canvas.RoundRect(x+20,y+15,x+40,y+40,6,2); //body
Canvas.Pen.Width:=4;
Canvas.Pen.Color:=8421376;
Canvas.MoveTo(x+20,y+20);
Canvas.LineTo(x+10,y+35); //left arm
Canvas.MoveTo(x+40,y+20);
Canvas.LineTo(x+50,y+15); //right arm
Canvas.MoveTo(x+22,y+40);
Canvas.LineTo(x+20,y+52); //left leg
Canvas.MoveTo(x+35,y+40);
Canvas.LineTo(x+40,y+52); //right leg
Canvas.Pen.Color:=16776960;
Canvas.Pen.Width:= 5;
Canvas.MoveTo(x+10,y+35);
Canvas.LineTo(x+10,y+35); //left hand
Canvas.MoveTo(x+50,y+15);
Canvas.LineTo(x+50,y+15); //right hand
Canvas.MoveTo(x+20,y+52);
Canvas.LineTo(x+20,y+52); //left foot
Canvas.MoveTo(x+40,y+52);
Canvas.LineTo(x+40,y+52); //right foot
Canvas.Pen.Color:=16776960;
Canvas.Brush.Color:= 16776960;
Canvas.Pen.Width:=3;
Canvas.RoundRect(x+25,y+6,x+36,y+15,7,7); //head
Canvas.Pen.Width:=1;
Canvas.Pen.Color:=255;
Canvas.MoveTo(x+36,y+8);
Canvas.LineTo(x+32,y+8); //eye
Canvas.Pen.Color:=16512;
Canvas.Pen.Width:=2;
Canvas.MoveTo(x+52,y+13);
Canvas.LineTo(x+45,y+3); //axe handle
Canvas.Pen.Color:=16711935;
Canvas.Pen.Width:=1;
Canvas.Brush.Color:=16711935;
Canvas.RoundRect(x+43,y+2,x+50,y+6,2,2);
Canvas.RoundRect(x+45,y+4,x+53,y+7,2,2); //axe head
end;

Read full topic
